source.name: Accessed Open Financial Data Filter
source.description: Results of an Open Data Demand survey (http://bit.ly/OpenDataDemand) being conducted by the World Bank Open Finances (https://finances.worldbank.org) and the World Bank Institute's Open Government (www.open-contracting.org ) teams to better understand the demand for open data with a focus on financial information. Specifically, the research project seeks to understand the gap between supply and demand of information and to discover open data use cases with implications for an international development context. The results of the survey will continue to be shared in open format and also be used to design an offline open data feedback pilot.
